menuItemGetAsIs.description: Saves the selected image the way that it is.

menuItemGetAsJPEG.description: Saves the selected image as joint photographic expert group image.

menuItemGetAsAVIF.description: Saves the selected image as a AV1 image file.

menuItemGetAsBMP.description: Saves the selected image as a bitmap.

menuItemGetAsPNG.description: Saves the selected image as portable network graphics.

menuItemGetAsWEBP.description: Saves the selected image as a web picture.

menuItemGetAsICO.description: Saves the selected image as an icon.

menuItemGetAsFF.description: Saves the selected image as a farbfeld.
